Uses of Interface
android.text.method.KeyListener

Packages that use KeyListener
android.text.method Provides classes that monitor or modify keypad input. 
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen. 
 

Uses of KeyListener in android.text.method
 

Classes in android.text.method that implement KeyListener
 class BaseKeyListener
           
 class DateKeyListener
          For entering dates in a text field.
 class DateTimeKeyListener
          For entering dates and times in the same text field.
 class DialerKeyListener
          For dialing-only text entry
 class DigitsKeyListener
          For digits-only text entry
 class MultiTapKeyListener
          This is the standard key listener for alphabetic input on 12-key keyboards.
 class NumberKeyListener
          For numeric text entry
 class QwertyKeyListener
          This is the standard key listener for alphabetic input on qwerty keyboards.
 class TextKeyListener
          This is the key listener for typing normal text.
 class TimeKeyListener
          For entering times in a text field.
 

Uses of KeyListener in android.widget
 

Methods in android.widget that return KeyListener
 KeyListener TextView.getKeyListener()
           
 

Methods in android.widget with parameters of type KeyListener
 void TextView.setKeyListener(KeyListener input)
          Sets the key listener to be used with this TextView.
